fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Rumorer: Every phase you do not attack someone, gain a random private or negative vote.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Gossip: Choose a player. The next two attacking cards will target your selected player. [2 uses, 4 CD]
- Frame: Select a player to appear as a different role for this phase. [3 uses, Post-Mortem]
- Probe: Choose a player. Learn their true role. [1 use, Unique, Post-Mortem]
